name: tajine with dried meat
ingredients: A bit of khlii fat or olive oil (for cooking)
steps: In an earthenware pan (or a real tajine), add a bit of khlii fat or olive oil. Heat it up.
Add the pieces of khlii. Let them cook for a few minutes to warm up.
Add the cumin and paprika. Mix well.
Make wells in the khlii and crack the eggs into them. Lightly salt the eggs.
Cover and let the eggs cook to your liking (soft or well-done).
Sprinkle with chopped parsley just before serving. Serve hot with bread.
